title: Global stocks fall after Trump's tariff plan
text:
Global stocks fall after Trump's tariff plan 11:11am GMT - 02:03 
The specter of a global trade war sent world stocks tumbling on Friday as global trading partners warned the US that its planned tariffs on steel and aluminum risk retaliation from other economies, and could endanger jobs. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The specter of a global trade war sent world stocks tumbling on Friday as global trading partners warned the US that its planned tariffs on steel and aluminum risk retaliation from other economies, and could endanger jobs.
